show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #29 Travis Krause "Staying ahead of supply chain issues"
subtitle: #29 Travis Krause "Staying ahead of supply chain issues"
summary:
Travis Krause joins us to talk about Carbon, Grazing, Cows and how he's staying ahead of supply chain issues down the road.

https://grazinglands.com/
https://www.parkercreekranch.com/

https://www.thepastoralist.blog/
